Package org.ejbca.util

Class CAIdTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ejbca.util.CAIdTools
  • public final class CAIdTools
extends Object

    Methods to update a changed CA Subject DN and CA Id in various objects.

    The methods always take an object to change, as well as the old and new CA Ids and the new Subject DN. They return true if the object was changed and should be updated in the database.

    The reason for having the methods here and not in the respective objects is:

    1. Access rules are simply a list of access rule objects, so it can't have any methods directly on it anyway.
    2. Some objects do not know about all of their properties. The ServiceConfiguration object does not know about the different types of services it can store.
    3. Some objects do not have a single base class, such as InternalKeyBindings which has two.
    Version:
    $Id: CAIdTools.java 28117 2018-01-29 09:58:24Z samuellb $

      • updateCAIds

        public static boolean updateCAIds​(CertificateProfile certProfile,
                                  int fromId,
                                  int toId,
                                  String toSubjectDN)
        Updates any references to a CA's CAId and Subject DN.
        Parameters:
        certProfile - Profile object to modify.
        fromId - Old CA Id to replace.
        toId - New CA Id to replace with.
        toSubjectDN - New CA Subject DN.
        Returns:
        True if the certificate profile was changed. If so it should be persisted to the database.

      • updateCAIds

        public static boolean updateCAIds​(Role role,
                                  List<RoleMember> roleMembers,
                                  int fromId,
                                  int toId,
                                  String toSubjectDN)
        Updates any references to a CA's CAId and Subject DN in the given role and list of role members.
        Parameters:
        role - Role to modify.
        roleMembers - List of the role's members. The members may be modified.
        fromId - Old CA Id.
        toId - New CA Id.
        toSubjectDN - New CA Subject DN.
        Returns:
        True if there was a change.

      • updateCAIds

        @Deprecated
public static boolean updateCAIds​(String roleName,
                                  Map<Integer,​AccessRuleData> rules,
                                  Map<Integer,​AccessUserAspectData> users,
                                  int fromId,
                                  int toId,
                                  String toSubjectDN)
        Deprecated.
        Updates any references to a CA's CAId and Subject DN.
        Parameters:
        roleName - Name of the role. Used when creating roles to replace the old roles with.
        rules - Access rules of the role. Updated in place.
        users - Access users of the role. Updated in place.
        fromId - Old CA Id.
        toId - New CA Id.
        toSubjectDN - New CA Subject DN.
        Returns:
        True if there was a change.
